body: Obsession? Yeah, that would be putting it lighly, has about ~20 works on/featuring her. And she's always getting abused/bullied or getting "prank'd" on, (japanese definition of "prank" which is a tag on most JAV sites implies "it's just a PRahNk, BuROUh!" but in rape format).
@trisomy 21 ikr! and i love him for it! Ogata zen is a god!
